info.name: Clean Wikipedia Articles
info.description: I made a Medium inspired Userstyle for Wikipedia articles, focusing on readability and clean black and white.
info.additionalInfo:

This is the first alpha version of this userstyle. There certainly will be issues with it. If you encounter an issue please send a description and the link of the Wikipedia page to eo@9di.de.
